item.title: Top 55 Useful AI Tools
item.description: The list of useful AI tools is inspired by the Howfinity video “I Tried 1200 AI Tools - These Are the Top 50”. 1. Jasper AI by OpenAI Link to heading Jasper AI, a pioneer in generative AI for content creation, assists in crafting marketing content with the backing of GPT technology from OpenAI. Category: Content Creation and Writing Assistance. Strengths: Intuitive content generation. Weaknesses: May require user edits for precision.
